sentences.english: Yet France’s Socialist Party also stands out as Europe’s most unreconstructed.

sentences.english: During this process of innovation, the Socialist Party shows a tendency of medium - oriented .

sentences.english: After 12 years of Mr Chirac, this was the Socialist Party's election to lose.
sentences.chinese: 希拉克先生当家的12年之后，社会党丢掉了选举。

sentences.english: Socialist parliamentarians broke out in applause after the vote went their way.
sentences.chinese: 社会党议员们投票结束离开时报以热烈的掌声。

definition: late-Qing underground resistance movement against the Qing dynasty
